item.nzh-sem:metakeywords: Australia, Premium, Coronavirus, Politics, National, NZ Government, Health
item.title: The data showing the success of NZ's lockdown over Australia's
item.description:
New academic analysis shows the level 4 lockdown in New Zealand not only allowed the country to catch up to Australia, but surpass it in terms of per capita Covid-19 cases.
The daily case rate in New ...
item.author: newsfeeds@nzherald.co.nz

item.description:
